"You must certainly teach her some manners, it isn't every day you 
will recieve guests such as myself. Lady Hawk told Zardus as they 
proceeded through the halls. She fealt almost insulted 
by the way Battera stormed away without the courtesy of acknowleging 
her before she left.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She growled at LadyHawk. She glared at this disrespectful, 
arrogant, 
> self absorbed bot. She was about to lose her last nerve and let 
> LadyHawk have it. She knew that she would have to go and calm down 
or 
> scrap this femme. "ZARDUS!" She realized she yelled and immediately 
> lowered her voice,"Zardus, If youhave no futher need of me, I would 
> like to go to my room for a bit."
> 
> She turned and walked off without waiting for Zardus to reply.  She 
> walked about 100 yards down the hall before she gave in to her hate 
> and slammed her hand into the wall. A loud bang could be heard all 
> through the hallway.  Her fist left a small dent in the wall. She 
hit 
> her fist one more time and then walked, very quickly to her room.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lady Hawks eye picked up movement behind her, Battera was 
following 
> > carefully. Lady Hawk laughed a little. "Walking an appropriate 
> > distance behind royalty? maybe theres some hope for that peasant 
> yet.-
